attributes.action: introduce a direct tax to fund an African agricultural revolution  and other development projects as recommended in the BBC Reith Lectures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the government to introduce a direct tax (approx. 50 pounds per person) to fund African development projects raising money spent on aid to 0.7% of GNP per year. Measures recommended by Jeffrey Sachs in the BBC Reith Lectures 2nd May, 2007. Fulfill the promise the British government made.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ConserveAfrica/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
